name: Garden Flipper
description:
Do you want to buy a large plot of land and build anything on it?
Or maybe you want to take care of him and develop?
Yes, everything is possible in our game.
Welcome to the garden game for fans to Tinker in the garden and build a house, and maybe for those who are in the soul of a farmer.
You will find an incredible adventure in the world of gardeners or just a man who loves his home.
How to play?
In the beginning, you are available to the plot with the house, the plot is abandoned, it is overgrown, You have to revive it and equip.
How to care?
Grass - there is a lot of grass on the plot to get level points and develop in the game, You need to get rid of the grass with a lawn mower.
Weeds and shrubs - as without them, but in this case, we have our own tool, take artisanal scissors and remove weeds from the site, for which You will also be rewarded with points levels.
Garbage - after noisy night parties, often there is a lot of garbage, You need to take a rake and collect all the garbage in packages, because exactly at 12:00 every day a garbage truck comes, You need to hurry, because for the garbage you get a lot of points.
Pollution scale - you will always see how clean your site is with the help of the pollution scale of the site, maintain cleanliness and you will successfully develop and earn.
Scale fatigue - Yes, we are all people and tired, if you are actively working, the scale of fatigue is growing in the eyes to relax you need to sleep, for this you go to Your home or buy and build a variety of recreational areas for entertainment, such as a swing.
Shop - after receiving the 2nd level, You can shop. In the store you buy tools, lighting, everything for fun, seeds, buildings and more.
Level system - for cleaning the territory and for courting, you get points levels, they directly affect Your progress through the game, the higher Your level, the more opportunities the game opens up to You.
Support and development.
We are constantly improving and refining our product.
But You can always contact us by e-mail or through the official social network groups.
